Name: Azure Windows - Install Octopus Tentacle
Description:
This step template will install the latest tentacle on an Azure hosted, Windows virtual machine. This will also open the firewall for inbound traffic on port 10933 on both the NSG and the the vm.
<hr />
*note: expects the Azure CLI to be installed on the worker running this task*

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.AzureAccount
Parameters.Label: Azure Account
Parameters.HelpText: Azure account with permissions to the virtual machine in which to install the tentacle on

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.azRgName
Parameters.Label: Azure Resource Group
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the resource group housing the NSG and VM

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.azNsgName
Parameters.Label: NSG Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the azure network security group to create

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.azNsgRulePriority
Parameters.Label: Azure NSG Rule Priority
Parameters.HelpText: the priority to assign to the NSG rule created for the octopus tentacle. Defaults to 400

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.azVmName
Parameters.Label: VM Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the virtual machine to target when

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.octoServerThumb
Parameters.Label: Server Thumbprint
Parameters.HelpText: The Thumbprint of the octopus server

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.octoApiKey
Parameters.Label: API Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API key used to configure the tentacle.

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.octopusRoles
Parameters.Label: Roles
Parameters.HelpText:
Roles to assign to this tentacle installation.
*Note: Each role should be on it's own line*

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.octopusEnvironments
Parameters.Label: Environments
Parameters.HelpText:
Environments to assign this tentacle installation to.
*Note: Each environment should be on its own line*

Parameters.Name: instrallTentacle.octoServerUrl
Parameters.Label: Server Url
Parameters.HelpText: The server url to register the tentacle with.  Defaults to the base url

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.tentacleType
Parameters.Label: Tentacle Type
Parameters.HelpText: Select between a listing or polling tentacle

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.tentacleHostName
Parameters.Label: Tentacle Host Name
Parameters.HelpText:
The host name to register the listening tentacles with. Octopus deploy server uses this value to reach out to the vm.
*Note: Leave blank to automatically use assigned public IP address.*

Parameters.Name: installWinTentacle.portNumber
Parameters.Label: Port Number
Parameters.HelpText: Port number used when installing and registering the tentacle.  This port is also opened when installing a listening tentacle
